22-1116.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Economic Development and Finance Committee Special Meeting held Thursday,August 18, 2022.Page 1 of 3411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 4:00 PMTUESDAY, SEPTEMBER 20, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND FINANCE COMMITTEE MINUTESA motion was made by Vice Chair Richardson, seconded by Member Allen, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 2 - Richardson and AllenAbsent: 1 - Mungo2.

22-1117.summary: Recommendation to conduct, receive, and file a Study Session and receive input from Economic Development and Finance Committee Members and members of the public regarding the final draft Blueprint 2.0, the proposed 10-year plan to create equitable economic opportunities for workers, investors, and entrepreneurs in the City of Long Beach through the year 2030.Nick Schultz, Executive Director, Pacific Gateway Workforce InvestmentNetwork, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Chair Mungo joined the meeting.Unidentified person spoke.Chair Mungo spoke.Councilwoman Allen spoke.Vice Chair Richardson spoke.Chair Mungo spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Mungo and Vice Chair Richardson.Councilwoman Allen spoke.Chair Mungo spoke.A motion was made by Vice Chair Richardson, seconded by Member Allen, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Mungo, Richardson and AllenPage 2 of 3411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 4:00 PMTUESDAY, SEPTEMBER 20, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND FINANCE COMMITTEE MINUTES3.
